Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th and Loomis due to, street blockage near 75th/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Ashland, 76th, Loomis and over regular route, due to street blockage near 75th/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
